name: SCALAR
description:
SCALAR is a virus that aim to hack the system .

Playing as scalar you got two main abilities for now ,

1-Scale things !, minimize - Reset or Maximize platforms.

2-Create moving platforms in the direction of your aim and speed determined by how far is your mouse from the character.

Note the game is still in a very early access stage, this version is submitted for the GameZanga8 event so its only a 3 days progress , you can follow up the game to receive notifications during the game development .
